title: Nov 2024 already and the weather is still like boiler
text:
SG weather really doomed...

ribena.bing Senior Member Joined Sep 23, 2024 Messages 1,089 Reaction score 1,139 6 minutes ago #4 The world is dying together lor just feel helpless but i know it will only worsen. Humans are forever selfish and cant work together for a single cause de I try avoid plastic and waste. Minimise carbon footprint. But fellow edmw just drive, pump petrol, blast aircon, dabao caipng Mmm. Then still complain weather hot
